import React from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; export default function CartItem({item, value}) { const {id, title, img, price, size, count, sign} = item; const {increment, decrement, removeItem} = value; return (
{title}
{sign}
{size.l}
decrement(id)}>-
{count}
increment(id)}>+
${price}
removeItem(id)}>Delete
) }
